verbs.description: [ARG1: superfan] celebrates [V: being] [ARG2: cancer free] [ARGM-MNR: with the goo goo dolls] sutton saw the band in september after winning a chance to meet them in person the meeting and the concerts were her way of celebrating a year of being cancer free diane sutton oxford pennants store michigan detroit grand rapids n y buffalo new york goo goo dolls buffalo dizzy up the girl
